comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printer, scanner, copier, fax. Standard model and "xi" model have different fax page memory sizes and zoom factor ranges for copying.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Consumables/Refills: 2 cartridges (1 black, 1 color)
